channel.title: CVE Feed for Symantec Corporation -- Symantec Endpoint Encryption
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Symantec Corporation -- Symantec Endpoint Encryption

item.title: CVE-2017-15525|2024-09-17T01:41:18.504Z -- symantec%20corporation -- symantec%20endpoint%20encryption
item.description: Prior to SEE v11.1.3MP1, Symantec Endpoint Encryption can be susceptible to a denial of service (DoS) attack, which is a type of attack whereby the perpetrator attempts to make a particular machine or network resource unavailable to its intended users by temporarily or indefinitely disrupting services of a specific host within a network.
